entry.def: If you receive reimbursement for money that you have spent, you get your money back, for example because the money should have been paid by someone else.

example.ex: She is demanding reimbursement for medical and other expenses...
example.tran: 她正在索赔医药费和其他花费。

example.ex: It can take up to six months before reimbursements are paid.
example.tran: 最长要等6个月才能得到赔付。

means.word_mean: 1. compensation paid (to someone) for damages or losses or money already spent etc.;
